# cmccloudv2_security_group (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cmccloudv2_security_group" "security_group1" {    
    name 		= "security_group_1" 
    description = "sg rules for public http access"
    stateful 	= true 
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the security group
- `stateful` (Boolean) The stateful of the security group, if true, the security group is stateful

### Optional

- `description` (String) The description of the security group
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
